headline.main: Wal-Mart Wage Hike to $15 an Hour Would Cost It $4.95 Billion: Study
headline.print_headline: Wal-Mart Wage Hike to $15 an Hour Would Cost It $4.95 Billion: Study

docs.snippet: Wal-Mart Stores Inc would have to spend an additional $4.95 billion if it were to raise the minimum wage for its hourly employees in the United States to $15 per hour from the current $10 per hour, according to an estimate by the UC Berkeley Cente...
docs.lead_paragraph: Wal-Mart Stores Inc would have to spend an additional $4.95 billion if it were to raise the minimum wage for its hourly employees in the United States to $15 per hour from the current $10 per hour, according to an estimate by the UC Berkeley Center for Labor Research.

headline.main: US Rig Count Rises 6 This Week to 414, 2nd Week of Gains
headline.print_headline: US Rig Count Rises 6 This Week to 414, 2nd Week of Gains

docs.snippet: The number of rigs exploring for oil and natural gas in the U.S. rose by six this week to 414, the second consecutive week the count has increased after a slide that lasted months and pushed the count to record-low levels amid collapsed energy pri...
docs.lead_paragraph: The number of rigs exploring for oil and natural gas in the U.S. rose by six this week to 414, the second consecutive week the count has increased after a slide that lasted months and pushed the count to record-low levels amid collapsed energy prices.

headline.main: Puerto Rico GO Bond Price Dips, Rescue Bill Moves to Senate
headline.print_headline: Puerto Rico GO Bond Price Dips, Rescue Bill Moves to Senate

docs.snippet: Puerto Rico's benchmark General Obligation bond fell in price on Friday in choppy trading after the U.S. House of Representatives passed legislation aimed at helping the U.S. territory fix its fiscal mess....
docs.lead_paragraph: Puerto Rico's benchmark General Obligation bond fell in price on Friday in choppy trading after the U.S. House of Representatives passed legislation aimed at helping the U.S. territory fix its fiscal mess.

headline.main: A Prince Wish, Paisley Park Eyed for Museum Like Graceland
headline.print_headline: A Prince Wish, Paisley Park Eyed for Museum Like Graceland

docs.snippet: Long before Prince died, he told close friends he wanted to turn his Paisley Park home and studio complex into a museum. Now, the trust company overseeing his estate — likely with the backing of Prince's siblings — is exploring the ide...
docs.lead_paragraph: Long before Prince died, he told close friends he wanted to turn his Paisley Park home and studio complex into a museum. Now, the trust company overseeing his estate — likely with the backing of Prince's siblings — is exploring the idea.

headline.main: Tribe Demands Details on Investigation Into Burned Woman
headline.print_headline: Tribe Demands Details on Investigation Into Burned Woman

docs.snippet: Nearly two months after a woman was found severely burned on the Crow Indian Reservation, the tribe is still seeking information about the case from federal investigators, tribal leaders said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Nearly two months after a woman was found severely burned on the Crow Indian Reservation, the tribe is still seeking information about the case from federal investigators, tribal leaders said.

headline.main: U.S. Army Reserve Major Threatened North Carolina Mosque: Police, Media
headline.print_headline: U.S. Army Reserve Major Threatened North Carolina Mosque: Police, Media

docs.snippet: A North Carolina man faces ethnic intimidation charges after leaving bacon at a mosque and making death threats to its members as they prepared for worship in observance of Ramadan, Islam's holy month, authorities said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A North Carolina man faces ethnic intimidation charges after leaving bacon at a mosque and making death threats to its members as they prepared for worship in observance of Ramadan, Islam's holy month, authorities said on Friday.
